title: The Itchy & Scratchy Show
description: The famous animated dueling duo! Itchy finds new and innovative ways to kill Scratchy. Hilarious!
quote: They fight! And bite! They fight and bite and fight!
altHero: Itchy sticks a vacuum hose in Scratchy’s mouth, some bees are buzzing about
alt1: Itchy is blowing glass and Scratchy is inside the glass bubble
alt2: Itchy injects a big syringe of steroids into Scratchy’s butt
alt3: Scratch is parade float sized, floating in the air and Itchy aims a flaming arrow at him
alt4: Itchy, mad scientist, holds a brain in his hand, Scratchy is a Frankenstein’s monster on a table with his head flap open
